javax.microedition.rms

Class RecordStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.microedition.rms.RecordStore

  • public class RecordStore
extends java.lang.Object
    The RecordStore class provides a mechanism for managing a collection of records. It supports operations such as adding, deleting, and retrieving records. Records are stored in a SQLite database.

    • Method Detail

      • addRecord

        public int addRecord(byte[] data,
                     int offset,
                     int numBytes)
              throws RecordStoreNotOpenException,
                     RecordStoreException,
                     RecordStoreFullException
        Adds a new record to the record store.
        Parameters:
        data - the data to be added as a record
        offset - the starting offset in the data array
        numBytes - the number of bytes to be added
        Returns:
        the record ID of the newly added record
        Throws:
        RecordStoreNotOpenException - if the record store is not open
        RecordStoreException - if a general record store exception occurs
        RecordStoreFullException - if the record store is full

      • closeRecordStore

        public void closeRecordStore()
                      throws RecordStoreNotOpenException,
                             RecordStoreException
        Closes the record store.
        Throws:
        RecordStoreNotOpenException - if the record store is not open
        RecordStoreException - if a general record store exception occurs

      • deleteRecord

        public void deleteRecord(int recordId)
                  throws RecordStoreNotOpenException,
                         InvalidRecordIDException,
                         RecordStoreException
        Deletes a record from the record store.
        Parameters:
        recordId - the ID of the record to be deleted
        Throws:
        RecordStoreNotOpenException - if the record store is not open
        InvalidRecordIDException - if the record ID is invalid
        RecordStoreException - if a general record store exception occurs

      • deleteRecordStore

        public static void deleteRecordStore(java.lang.String recordStoreName)
                              throws RecordStoreException,
                                     RecordStoreNotFoundException
        Deletes the record store with the specified name.
        Parameters:
        recordStoreName - the name of the record store to be deleted
        Throws:
        RecordStoreException - if a general record store exception occurs
        RecordStoreNotFoundException - if the record store is not found

      • enumerateRecords

        public RecordEnumeration enumerateRecords(RecordFilter filter,
                                          RecordComparator comparator,
                                          boolean keepUpdated)
                                   throws RecordStoreNotOpenException
        Returns an enumeration for traversing the records in the record store.
        Parameters:
        filter - the filter to apply to the records
        comparator - the comparator to use for sorting the records
        keepUpdated - whether to keep the enumeration updated
        Returns:
        a RecordEnumeration for traversing the records
        Throws:
        RecordStoreNotOpenException - if the record store is not open

        public byte[] getRecord(int recordId)
                 throws RecordStoreNotOpenException,

        Parameters:
        recordId - the ID of the record to be retrieved
        Returns:
        the data of the record
        Throws:
        RecordStoreNotOpenException - if the record store is not open
        InvalidRecordIDException - if the record ID is invalid
        RecordStoreException - if a general record store exception occurs

      • getRecord

        public int getRecord(int recordId,
                     byte[] buffer,
                     int offset)
              throws RecordStoreNotOpenException,
                     InvalidRecordIDException,
                     RecordStoreException
        Retrieves the data of a record with the specified ID into a buffer.
        Parameters:
        recordId - the ID of the record to be retrieved
        buffer - the buffer to store the record data
        offset - the starting offset in the buffer
        Returns:
        the record ID if successful, -1 otherwise
        Throws:
        RecordStoreNotOpenException - if the record store is not open
        InvalidRecordIDException - if the record ID is invalid
        RecordStoreException - if a general record store exception occurs

      • openRecordStore

        public static RecordStore openRecordStore(java.lang.String recordStoreName,
                                          boolean createIfNecessary)
                                   throws RecordStoreException,
                                          RecordStoreFullException,
                                          RecordStoreNotFoundException
        Opens a record store with the specified name.
        Parameters:
        recordStoreName - the name of the record store
        createIfNecessary - whether to create the record store if it does not exist
        Returns:
        the opened RecordStore
        Throws:
        RecordStoreException - if a general record store exception occurs
        RecordStoreFullException - if the record store is full
        RecordStoreNotFoundException - if the record store is not found

      • setRecord

        public void setRecord(int recordId,
                      byte[] newData,
                      int offset,
                      int numBytes)
               throws RecordStoreNotOpenException,
                      InvalidRecordIDException,
                      RecordStoreException,
                      RecordStoreFullException
        Sets the data of a record with the specified ID.
        Parameters:
        recordId - the ID of the record to be updated
        newData - the new data for the record
        offset - the starting offset in the new data array
        numBytes - the number of bytes to be set
        Throws:
        RecordStoreNotOpenException - if the record store is not open
        InvalidRecordIDException - if the record ID is invalid
        RecordStoreException - if a general record store exception occurs
        RecordStoreFullException - if the record store is full
